prodNameC: 伯樂亞 巨細胞病毒 IgM 試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
R1: Microplate: 12 strips with 8 breakable wells, coated with anti-human μ chains
R2: Concentrated washing solution (20x): TRIS-NaCl buffer, 2% Tween 20, < 1.5% ProClin 300
R3: Negative control: negative human serum for IgM antibodies to CMV, and negative for HBs antigen, anti-HIV1, anti-HIV2 and anti-HCV, < 1.5% ProClin 300
R4: Calibrator: Human serum reactive for IgM antibodies to CMV, and negative for HBs antigen, anti-HIV1, anti-HIV2 and anti-HCV, < 1.5% ProClin 300
R5: Positive control: human serum reactive for IgM antibodies to CMV, and negative for HBs antigen, anti-HIV1, anti-HIV2 and anti-HCV, < 1.5% ProClin 300
R6a: CMV antigen: lyophilized CMV antigen, < 1.5% ProClin 300

R6b: Conjugate (101x): murine monoclonal antibody anti-CMV labeled with peroxydase, < 1.5% ProClin 300
R7: Diluent for samples and conjugate: Tris-NaCl buffer, fetal calf serum, goat serum, mouse IgG, phenol red, < 1.5% ProClin 300
R9: Chromogen TMB: 3.3’.5.5’ tetramethylbenzidine < 0.1%, H2O2 < 1%
R10: Stooping solution: 1N sulfuric acid solution
applicantName: 美商伯瑞股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市松山區南京東路4段126號14樓
efficacy: Platelia TM巨細胞病毒 IgM 抗體檢驗試劑是一種免疫捕捉 (immunocapture) 原理，定性偵測人類血清或血漿中巨細胞病毒IgM抗體的免疫分析法。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3175 巨細胞病毒血清試劑
